about.title: About
paragraphs: Hello, I'm Manuel Armando Cariongo, a software developer passionate about creating innovative and scalable solutions. With solid experience in mobile and web application development, I master technologies such as TypeScript, JavaScript, Java, React, React Native, MySQL, MongoDB, among others, working on both the back-end and front-end of systems.

I am currently pursuing a degree in Computer Engineering at ISPTEC, where I have the opportunity to develop my knowledge in various areas of computer science, including high-level software development (web, mobile, desktop), low-level systems development (operating systems, compilers, etc.), computer networks, data analysis (AI), and more.

From January to September 2022, I had the opportunity to intern at Tecno Society as a mobile developer, where I was able to practically apply my knowledge and, most importantly, learn a lot about the dynamics of the job market and the daily life of a software developer. After completing the internship, I became a full member of the same company, working not only as a mobile developer but also as a back-end developer. For these roles, I mainly use React Native, Node.js, and Spring Boot.
Throughout this period, I have worked on several non-paid projects, acting as a mobile, back-end, and front-end developer.

I am seeking an opportunity as a Full-Stack, Front-End, or Back-End Developer, where I can apply my experience and skills to create exceptional user experiences. I am dedicated, proactive, and always looking for professional growth, ready to face new challenges and learn from experienced teams.
If you are looking for a committed professional with a strong desire to grow, please get in touch! I am excited to discuss how I can contribute to the success of your next project.

projects.title: Projects
projects.introduction: I've worked on several different projects, giving my best effort in each of them and contributing with quality in every line of code. Below are listed some of the projects I've worked on.
